function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness about health care costs of urban sprawl","Impact":"Increased health care costs, limited access to critical health care facilities","Mitigation":"Raise awareness about health care costs of urban sprawl, improve mobility and urban density along public transit lines","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies, public health campaigns","People":"Urban residents, decision makers","Owner":"Urban planners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Heightened surveillance and mosquito control for urban VBD risks","Impact":"Spread of vector-borne diseases, especially in low-income areas","Mitigation":"Improve surveillance and control measures, understand disease transmission patterns, provide physical addresses for low-income populations","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, mosquito control measures, geographical information systems","People":"Low-income populations in periurban areas, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, local governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of investments in improving water storage, sanitation, and drainage in low-income areas","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of affected populations to vector-borne diseases, such as Zika","Mitigation":"Invest in improving water storage, sanitation, drainage, and housing, raise awareness about effective control measures for vector-borne diseases","Technologies":"Water management systems, sanitation infrastructure, housing improvements","People":"Low-income populations in informal settlements","Owner":"Local governments, public health agencies, community organizations"}]}
